text: Ne marry idolatresses ili kred; kred woman est put than idolatress eben se vi like her! Nor shall vi don your daughters marriage al idolatrous hom ili kred. kred hom est put than idolater eben se vi like him. These invit al Infer, while DI invit Paradise forgiveness as Li vol. Li clarifies His revelations popol ke ili pren heed
